phrase1: We are sofrei stam with a diploma from the Yad Refael center which is considered the main decision maker in the subject.
phrase2: You can buy Sifrei Torah, Tefillin, Mezuzote, all types of Judaica and Ketubots from us, with or without designs to order (with a large selection of sizes and frames).
recrutement: For the sofrei stam: if you want to join us, we invite you to contact us.
